mapper.select: select date, detail, c_s_m.name as c_s_m_name, c_s_m.id as c_s_m_id, c_s_p.name as c_s_p_name, c_s_p.id as c_s_p_id, store_name, staff_name from customer_service_history as c_s_h join customer_service_purpose as c_s_p on c_s_h.customer_service_purpose_id = c_s_p.id join customer_service_means as c_s_m on c_s_h.customer_service_mean_id = c_s_m.id where c_s_h.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into customer_service_history (date, user_id, store_id, store_name, staff_id, staff_name, customer_service_purpose_id, customer_service_mean_id) values (#{date}, #{userId}, #{storeId}, #{storeName}, #{staffId}, #{staffName}, #{customerServicePurposeId}, #{customerServiceMeanId})
